dcterms:creator: A. G. Barto
R. S. Sutton
C. W. Anderson
dcterms:description: The CartPole dataset involves an agent trying to keep a pole upright by applying horizontal forces to a cart. The task distribution is defined by varying the pole length, affecting the dynamics of the environment.
dcterms:title: CartPole

dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
Y. Tian
dcterms:description: Doom is a first-person shooter game used for training agents with actor-critic curriculum learning. The dataset is utilized to demonstrate the effectiveness of reward shaping in complex environments.
dcterms:title: Doom

dcterms:creator: OpenAI
dcterms:description: Dota 2 is a multiplayer online battle arena game where agents are trained to play using deep reinforcement learning techniques. The dataset is referenced for its complexity and the challenges it presents in reward shaping.
dcterms:title: Dota 2

dcterms:creator: A. Tamar
Y. Wu
G. Thomas
S. Levine
P. Abbeel
dcterms:description: Grid Games are environments modeled as grids where agents navigate and plan their actions. The dataset is used to study automatic reward shaping in complex environments with sparse rewards.
dcterms:title: Grid Games

dcterms:creator: M. Jaderberg
W. M. Czarnecki
I. Dunning
L. Marris
G. Lever
A. G. Castaneda
C. Beattie
N. C. Rabinowitz
A. S. Morcos
A. Ruderman
dcterms:description: This dataset involves training agents for first-person multiplayer games using population-based deep reinforcement learning. It highlights the challenges of reward shaping in complex environments.
dcterms:title: Jaderberg et al. (2018)
